content.text: Match ends, Sevilla 1, Atlético de Madrid 3.
Second Half ends, Sevilla 1, Atlético de Madrid 3.
Foul by Federico Fazio (Sevilla).
Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Goal!  Sevilla 1, Atlético de Madrid 3. Cristian Rodríguez (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the right to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Leo Baptistao following a fast break.
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Diego Godín tries a through ball, but Diego Costa is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Ivan Rakitic (Sevilla) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
Foul by Mario Suárez (Atlético de Madrid).
